Loading necessary packages for data exploration

```{r}
#| label: load-packages

library(tidyverse)
```

## Data

My data source is the table with Forest Inventory and Analysis (FIA) plots that have intersected with aerial detection survey (ADS) polygons containing bark beetle mortality, using a 400 meter buffer.

```{r}
#| include: false

read_csv("data_raw/ADS_wbp_outbreak.csv")

```
